text: swim. Amazing bedlam rocked in our eyes. The sea boiled with waves, they galloped. to the walls and spumed over the Promenade des Anglais. A huge crowd had collected. There were firemen and policemen and ambulances, and the eyes of the spectators were hard with disaster.
handwritten_text: swim. Amazing bedlam rocked in our eyes. The sea boiled with waves, they galloped. to the walls and spumed over the Promenade des Anglais. A huge crowd had collected. There were firemen and policemen and ambulances, and the eyes of the spectators were hard with disaster.
